game.name: Whispers Of The Shadow
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 캡션 이용 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Detective Grace Lawson sets out immediately upon receiving a tip about her missing stepsister Amy, and when she gets there, she suddenly finds herself trapped inside the house. Now, Grace has only one goal: to find her missing sister and escape this nightmare.
